abstract: Transportation Security Admin administrator Peter V Neffenber tells House Homeland Security Committee that airline passengers will continue to experience longer wait times at security checkpoints despite efforts to shorten wait times; points to expected increase in airport traffic during summer as reason.
lead_paragraph: The agency is adding screeners at airport security checkpoints, but delays are expected to continue as summer travel increases.

headline.main: Airport Security Delays Won’t End Soon, T.S.A. Chief Says
headline.print_headline: Fliers to Be Kept Waiting for Shorter Lines, T.S.A. Says

snippet: The agency is adding screeners at airport security checkpoints, but delays are expected to continue as summer travel increases.
